title: Stop dodge on ARAM
body:
Please do something about the dodging players.I am trying to play an aram for the last 30 minutes.15 dodgers in a row.I think the actual system in which you get a 15 minutes ban is just not enough.Anyone can dodge a game and go for 15 minutes / 30 minutes do something then return and dodge another.Try give them a 30 minutes ban and on the third 1 hr for 5 games.It's not fair.I want to play not spend my time in queue waiting for decent cerebral players.
Ty

replies.body: This is actually how 80% of all ppl feel that play aram, including me. I suggest that they would give the champion back again the next aram they play.
